definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hasten (NH Pi., and deriv.; Ar. mahara be practised, skilled (with As. mâru, send, order, govern, cf. II. [[מהר]]); Eth. mahara: train teach; Syr. mhr Pa. id.; cf. also Egypt. māhar, trained warrior Bondi:57);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נִמְהָָרָה]] Job 5:13; Pt. [[נִמְהָר]] Hb Hab 1:6; pl. [[נִמְהָרִים]] Is 32:4; cstr. [[נִמְהֲרֵי]] Is 35:4; —be hurried = anxious, disturbed [[נְמְהֲרֵי־לֵב]] Is 35:4; hasty, precipitate, subj. [[עֵחָה]] Job 5:13; so pt. as subst. Is 32:4; impetuous, of Chaldeans, Hb Hab 1:6 (‖[[מַר]]).

definitions.title: l.
definitions.body: hasten, make haste, = go or come quickly Ge 18:6, 1Sa 9:12 ( but del. LXX We Dr Kit Bu HPS), Na 2:6, Is 49:17, 1Ch 12:9; = go eagerly, (sq. Inf. of purpose) Pr 1:16 Is 59:7; Pt. = swift, prompt Mal 3:5; of bird Pr 7:23; fig. of calamity Is 5:19 (‖[[חוּשׁ]]) Je 48:16, [[מַהֵר שָׁלָל חָשׁ בַּז]] Is 8:1, Is 8:3, infr.

hasten + vb., (´[[מ]] having really adverbial force): sq. Inf. Ge 18:7 ([[מִהַר]] [[לַעֲשׂת]]); cf. Ge 27:20, Ge 41:32 (subj. God), Ex 2:18, Ex 10:16, Ex 12:33, 2Sa 15:14, Is 32:4, Is 51:14, Pr 6:18, Ec 5:1; more often sq. vb. c. [[ו]] Ge 24:18, Ge 24:20, Ge 24:46, Ge 44:11 (all J), Ge 45:9, Ge 45:13 (E), prob. Ge 43:30 (J), also Ex 34:8 (J), Jos 4:10, Jos 8:14, Jos 8:19 (all JE), Ju Jdg 13:10, 1Sa 4:14, 1Sa 17:48, 1Sa 23:27, 1Sa 25:18, 1Sa 25:23, 1Sa 25:34, 1Sa 25:34, 1Sa 28:24, 2Sa 15:14, 2Sa 19:17, 1Ki 20:33, 1Ki 20:41, 2Ki 9:13, Je 9:17; so even when act. is not wholly voluntary 1Sa 28:20 (but rd. prob. [[וַיִּבָּהֵל]] LXX We Dr Kit Bu); also, [[ו]] om., Ps 106:13; esp. c. Imv. Ge 19:22 (J), Ju Jdg 9:48, Es 6:10; so also [[מַהֵר עֲנֵנִי]] Ps 69:18, Ps 102:3, Ps 143:7; cf. Ps 79:8 (v. Ol:ad loc.).
trans. hasten, = prepare quickly Ge 18:6; = bring quickly 1Ki 22:9 = 2Ch 18:8, Es 5:5; = do quickly 2Ch 24:5, 2Ch 24:5.
